page.title: 12Survey of Family Life
page.content: Of the families surveyed 60% had 2chn, 24% 3chn,10% 1ch &6% 4chn.None had any grandparents living-in,but 24% had a grandparent living in Rayleigh &34% a parent born in Rayleigh.95% lived in a house,27% of which were det.& built in the past 20yrs.69% of families owned a TV,washing machine,telephone,freezer & video.Over half had a computer.92% had central heating &13% had a coal fire. 75% families had a pet.Only 1% attend church regularly.25% 8yr old had under 50p pocket money,37% 50p-Â£1,22% Â£1+ & 16% had 0p.BREAKFAST:-37% had cook- ed meal regularly,66% had hot drink,58 % had cereals 44% had bread &17% had no breakfast.HOBBIES:For children-draw ing,cycling,collections & clubs.18-30 age:cooking,music,reading & dancing.31 -60age:reading,knitting,gardening,wine making & do-it-yourself.For the 60+age
